text: Hans-Ulrich Klose (29 March 1935 â€“ 7 February 2022) was a German politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany. He was in the Landtag of North Rhine-Westphalia from 1985 to 2005. Klose died in Korschenbroich, Germany on 7 February 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Union of Germany
title: Hans-Ulrich Klose (politician, born 1935)
